World.headline: In 'clear message', Malaysia, India slam cross-border terror
World.summary: Malaysia has joined India in unequivocally condemning cross-border terrorism, indicating a strengthened alignment between the two nations on this critical issue. Prime Minister Modi emphasized the need for clear messages against terror, rejecting double standards or compromise. The bilateral meeting also resulted in numerous agreements covering defense, security, economic cooperation, and social security for Indian workers.
key_points: Malaysia and India jointly condemned cross-border terrorism.
PM Modi stressed no double standards or compromise on terror.

World.headline: India, Canada step up security cooperation
World.summary: National Security Advisor Ajit Doval's visit to Canada has resulted in a "shared workplan" focused on bilateral cooperation in national security and law enforcement. Both countries have agreed to establish liaison officers to improve communication and information sharing on vital issues like drug trafficking and organized crime. This initiative aims to rebuild trust and pave the way for more high-level engagements in the future.

World.headline: Lamborghini goes berserk in market, hits vehicles, injures pedestrians; FIR against tycoon's son
World.summary: A speeding Lamborghini, allegedly driven by tobacco tycoon KK Mishra's son Shivam Kumar Mishra, caused chaos in Kanpur's Gwal Toli area on Sunday. World.headline: Delhi pit death case: Labourer who 1st spotted biker arrested for not informing authorities
World.summary: A labourer, Yogesh, has been arrested for allegedly failing to report a biker's fall into a deep pipeline pit in Janakpuri. The injured biker, Kamal Dhyani, remained trapped for eight hours before authorities were alerted. The sub-contractor, Rajesh Kumar Prajapati, also arrested, reportedly saw Dhyani but left without informing anyone.
key_points: Labourer arrested for not reporting a biker's fall into a pit in Delhi.
Biker trapped for eight hours due to lack of immediate reporting.
Sub-contractor also arrested for similar negligence.
Incident highlights public safety and reporting responsibility.

Police are investigating the circumstances, exploring possibilities of triple suicide or homicide. A soft drink bottle is undergoing forensic analysis to determine cause of death.
